name: Twilight's Basics Plus Challenges Trial
description:
Welcome to the Twilight's Basics Plus Challenges Trial! It shows that 3 new challenges have been coming to Twilight's Basics Plus, which is the challenges mode!

Speedy Challenge

It's just Susie and Twilight in this challenge. you both move ultra fast. Can you collect 25 papers to win?

Stealthy Challenge

You're stuck in school after hours! Rainbow Dash Clones are after you. Use Dirty Chalk Erasers, Lockers, and maps to avoid them and collect 7 papers.

Grapple Challenge

Zetrus's legs have been broken, but you have unlimited access to a grappling hook! Outwit Twilight Sparkle and the other characters since it's his only way to move!
